subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Federer, the No. 2 seed, earned a rare break of Isner’s serve and won in straight sets, advancing to play Richard Gasquet in the quarterfinals.
snippet: Federer, the No. 2 seed, earned a rare break of Isner’s serve and won in straight sets, advancing to play Richard Gasquet in the quarterfinals.
